page.title: 18SCHOOL MEALS.
page.content: Headfield Middle School provides {school meals}every day for{300 {children.}Compared with other schools the meals at Headfield are very good. Most children{hate}school meals but I'm sure if they came to our school they would{enjoy}them. The meals always contain{protein}and are very good for the children's {health.}A few children are never satisfied so they throw their food away. The cooks make{warm}and{cold dinners. The warm dinners are {different}every day, the cold dinners are usually{salads.}The dinners cost Â£2.50 per week or 50pence per day. We line up for dinner outside at 12 o clock, and we have one hour and fifteen minutes for lunch. We pay for our dinners in the morning after registration, and at dinnertime it's ready and waiting.
